column4: heck, at the very least could someone suggest a channel where someone might acknowledge my existence and answer my question?
i've been searching google for about 3 days now and asking nicely in here at the same time and nobody/nothing gave me any help
-> the expertise may not be around when you have asked, so be patient, ask every 15 minutes or so
-> not at the moment aparently, just hang around for a few more
